message: Starting investigation of backend API and MCP server to understand reviewer agent identification
Analyzing reviewer agent identification patterns in real_mcp_server.py - found key pattern: reviewer agents have type 'reviewer-{review_id}-{number}'
Examining backend API structure - found AgentData model exposes 'type' field which contains reviewer pattern, also found ReviewData model in TaskDetail

Investigation complete. Found: 1) Reviewer agents identified by type='reviewer-{id}-{num}' pattern, 2) Backend API already exposes agent.type field for identification, 3) ReviewData available via TaskDetail.reviews. No backend changes needed - UI can distinguish reviewers using existing data.
